text: The legend of One Piece intro.
Luffy stabs his face to prove he can join, but shanks refuses.
keep trying.
Stop trying to impress Shanks. Find a boat and sail away.
Shanks still refuses and when they are in a bar, the bandits headed by Higuma appear. Higuma demands for more drinks and humiliates Shanks.
Sea King attacks and Luffy falls off a boat and drowns immediately due to a devil fruit he ate.
Get angry at Shanks and leave.
Laugh it off just like other Red haired pirates.
Luffy's arm stretches unexpectedly, revealing he ate the Devil Fruit.The Red Hair Pirates had gone off on another voyage. Later, Higuma bandits came back.
The Red-Haired Pirates later find out the Gomu Gomu No Mi was stolen from their chest.Shanks suspects the bandits.
pick a fight with them.
leave to stay out of trouble.
come out and tell that you ate the fruit in the chest.
dont say anything because the bandits deserved punishment from Shanks.
Shanks laughs it off and explains that Luffy now has a rubber body.
Shanks intimidates the bandits but finds out they weren't the culprits. Later, Luffy's rubber body is revealed and Shanks gets disappointed at Luffy's failure to be honest.
Higuma kidnaps Luffy for fighting him and decides to sell him to circus because of his rubber body.
get angry and keep insulting him.
beg him to let go.
Higuma gets mad and decides to kill him. But Shanks and his crew come back and Shanks loses his arm in the process.
Higuma ties him down in his cabin. Shanks comes back to rescue Luffy and succeeds while Higuma and his crew flee.
